website_summaries.verdict: A favorable set of mud flaps with unique features and a high level of durability.
pros: Made of strong PVC plastic to withstand scratches and dents common while driving at high speeds
Holds its shape in extreme cold and hot temperatures
cons: The fit on smaller truckers and SUVs is not ideal
May require a heavy-duty size vehicle

customer_reviews.title: Work well on a 2018 full size Polaris Ranger.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my purpose! Needed something to keep the tires from throwing mud forward and up under the seats of a 2018 full size Polaris Ranger. Why Polaris has that area open for that to happen is a mystery. Fortunately blocking off that area wasn't too difficult. These guards fit perfectly except for one slight cut out modification needed on the driver side. Passenger side hangs fine with no modification. Used angle iron, stainless steel screws, washers and nuts to hang them. Not only do they work well, they look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Les Active

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Always hard buying items not on prime but since they were about a third of the price of buying them from an aftermarket truck shop I took a chance on these and couldn’t be happier! They are very heavy duty rubber but not too stiff and are just the right size for my f350 dually. They also arrived in about a week which is much better then other items not sold on prime. Highly recommend these for SRW and dually trucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in America and good quality.  Love it
customer_reviews.text: Made a hole punch to cut the holes in it to mount. I trimmed it a little with a box knife. Has what appears to be fiberglass reinforcement in it. Good quality for the price and made in America. Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Super mud flares that are unique & 1 of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: This is really worth the purchase its also large extra large I should say for the price where you could alter it to your own sizes . Or leave it just as large on a truck with some 4 inch tires sticking out from fenders this would still pass to cover it very durable easy to install and fabricate as well , looks unique and one of a kind on my truck although this size is meant for the large rigs and trucks on the long haul road cross country but it stands out neatly & one of a kind !
customer_reviews.author: Shayscorpio

customer_reviews.title: Dog door
customer_reviews.text: We did not use it in your traditional since we used it to make our dog door flap and it worked great easy to cut and easier to install into the door to fit so it works great for that purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Cravens family

customer_reviews.title: Nice mudflap
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty mud flap, semi rigid construction keeps flap from flying around like the previous rubber flaps I replaced. Arrived fast and in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Ernest E. Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy and setve their purpose well. I just drilled them directly into the frame of the flatbed
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: Good mudflaps
customer_reviews.text: Mudflaps fit my need.. Installed easily and have held up well so far. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mud flaps and Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mud flaps for my motorhome to replace the old ones. I bought them because they were reasonably priced but was apprehensive of the quality. When I received them I was pleasantly surprised to find the rubber was thick and reinforced with infused fiberglass. And there Made in the USA not China like the discription listed.
customer_reviews.author: Jan McCrary

customer_reviews.title: These were just the right size to cover the width ...
customer_reviews.text: These were just the right size to cover the width of the dual wheels of my Ford E350 based motorhome and long enough to reach within 3 inches of the ground to protect my towed vehicle. Fiber reinforced plastic material appears very durable and smooth finish should not allow much to stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G

customer_reviews.title: Basic Mudflaps, Which Is Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be well made. Had to cut mine down to size, but I was expecting that. Pretty flexible without being flimsy. Good weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: william vogel

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I used them to replace the flaps on my motorhome after a blowout. I had to trim the flap to make it fit but it was easy to do with my razor blade knife.

customer_reviews.title: These are 18.5" wide x 24" high, great price and quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Description didn't specify, but these are 18.5" wide x 24" high. Looks good so far, have not mounted them yet. They're are as good a quality HD mud flap as is available for my lifted 2500 HD 4x4. Making a removable mount so that rocks and stones will be blocked from hitting my boat. Nice cheap price too.
customer_reviews.author: Fishfreq

customer_reviews.title: Broke off in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size but one broke off in just a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: BizNet Systems Kenneth I McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: These are exactly what i was looking for! They ...
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what i was looking for! They are big, heavy duty, and can be trimmed. These will last a long time!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty mud flaps and work great on our RV.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and feel sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and feel sturdy. I suspect that will last a very long time. These work perfectly on a 1992 Pace Arrow on a P30 chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Henson

customer_reviews.title: was ordered for a friend and he loved them as his old ones were cracked and these ...
customer_reviews.text: was ordered for a friend and he loved them as his old ones were cracked and these fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and 10x better than Rallyarmor
customer_reviews.text: Used these for DIY mudflaps for my Subaru. Worked great and 10x better than Rallyarmor. The key is these are pliable rubber versus the non-pliable plastic which bends and doesnt return to its normal shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fast shipping from the seller
customer_reviews.text: Look for a set every where even on eBay cant beat the price nor the quality. I used the aluminum from my old set and drove a week with one of each, the comments where, "I like the new one better!". They thought I bought on new ones and just replaced one, they didn't know I had taken the diamond plate off cleaned polished them and put them on this set. Saved me $$$ which I really like. Good Luck yoo wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donn Dorminey

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, was easy to cut to the size and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, was easy to cut to the size and shape I needed for my application. Thick, weighty, heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and durable
customer_reviews.text: We have a big jacked up chevy on 33s with a 15 inch lift. Couldn't find a better deal 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: Tabbetha LeVeque

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide mud flaps
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mud flaps to keep the stones from Stone pecking trailer working good so far thanks again great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These were installed on a Chevy 3500 with a utility bed. They were a little long, so I trimmed them with a razor. Other than that, very easy to install. They have scaling on one side to keep the road junk from sticking to it. definitely a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: but looks good on our 2006 Cummins flatbed
customer_reviews.text: Little shorter than I wanted, but looks good on our 2006 Cummins flatbed!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra shore

customer_reviews.title: decent, but not recommended for anything smaller than a 2500, or F250.
customer_reviews.text: They don't offer half stars for the ratings here, and I would call it a little better than a 3 but not quite a 4.....so I have to give it a 3. Very thick and heavy duty, but not quite what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: weavertv

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost Solution
customer_reviews.text: I cut one mud guard in half and usedd it to extend the existing mud guards on my motorhome to reduce the amount of sand and stones which could be thrown into the front of my tow vehicle. Much better than a $200 screen or nose guard.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Mud guards are as described. I bought them to make mud guard extensions for my ATV, and they will work just as I hoped. Heavy material with just enough flexibility. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: vitaman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty. They were bigger then I thought they would be. But very nice martial used.
customer_reviews.author: ashton jessen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price on mud flaps
customer_reviews.text: These are a solid product. Very simple to install and built extremely well. Save yourself some money and buy these, then go out and buy whatever anchors you want for the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: BSG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I put them on my truck ,they are the only ones big enough .
customer_reviews.author: willy

customer_reviews.title: Nice stiff flaps
customer_reviews.text: Nice stiff flaps. I cut them to a smaller size to work on my mudflap mounts on a lifted Silverado 2500. Look great and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These guards are perfect for what I needed. They went on quite smoothly and they stop rocks from hitting my trailer windows. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Plain black mud guard 24" x 18.5"
customer_reviews.text: The price was right but the individual advertising indicated a product 24" x 24". Even now when you look at the specifications they are wrong, however the product appears to be first rate. I only need mudguards that are 12" tall so will have to cut these down. They do have a nice reinforced mounting area at the top of the mudguard that will add substantially to its durability. I only gave the product a "4" due to the fact of faulty information.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product but if it is too close to the exhaust it will want to melt
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: right size and flexible material
customer_reviews.text: size was important- needed to make splash guards for 5th wheel trailer
customer_reviews.author: cindy horton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost an exact match for my old dually mud guard from the E-450.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for use on a motorhome. Needed to be trimmed a bit which I expected. They are very heavy duty thick material. I would recommend these..
customer_reviews.author: Mountaindog Oz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome mud flaps affordable and great quality. they were just a little wide for me so i had to cut them but that was very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Horn

customer_reviews.title: Can modify easily.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and easy cut. Modified them for gmc 3/4 ton.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Hardware
customer_reviews.text: It looks like they will hold up fine but there is no hardware included as is stated in the description. A different item might be desired if you don't want to find your own.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Okay item
customer_reviews.text: These were more flimsy than I would have liked. But they serve their purpose and I just reinforced them so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: ttowngrl

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a decent product but it says it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent product but it says it comes with all necessary mounting hardware and didnt come with any hardware at all
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: These are a very good mudflap will order again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fiberglass backing. it make them ridged but able to bend when needed.
customer_reviews.author: texasfireparamedic

customer_reviews.title: Works on 2006 GMC W3500 Turbo Diesel Box Truck
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on this vehicle (for the back), needed no modifications or cutting. Very thick and well made, thicker around the top where hardware is used. Highly recommended and great price. USA made.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Universal fitting
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on our ford f450 . Had to attach it with bolts but any one with common sense can figure this out
customer_reviews.author: abbas

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy. Very basic
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple. It's a mudflap. Heavy, and sturdy. Very basic.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product . Would highly recommend. Perfect fit for my dually.
customer_reviews.author: manuel baca

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed to make my own mud flaps and this is the best buy for mud flap material. I spent much time searching the web and this is the best source. Shipping on this product elsewhere will kill you. Thick, sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. L

customer_reviews.title: Great Mud Flaps
customer_reviews.text: I love these mud flaps! They are easy to install and look great. I've had them on my Ford F350 dually for almost 6 months now and they stand up well to abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Must get this!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just how I wanted to curve around the wheel well in back... I just undercoated the whole truck so I wanted to make sure it get it's maximum protection
customer_reviews.author: Molyneaux

customer_reviews.title: Not what it is made for
customer_reviews.text: We use this to replace our very large dog door flap that is for our Great Danes. The flaps that you can buy to replace the torn flaps are much more expensive and do not last. Our cats are able to still get in and out and the Danes have not been able to tear it up like before. Just cut it down to fit your door and it screws under the frame to work like the one from the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what was advertised, Fast delivery, but I should have ordered smaller ones for my custom project.
customer_reviews.author: Toolmaster

product_meta.title: Plasticolor 000331R01 Plain Black Mud Guard - 24 inch - Set of 2
product_meta.description: PlastiColor Plain Black Mud Guards are the most colorful and durable flaps with a patented, fiberglass backing that not only keeps them from cracking or splitting, but also adds " memory" to keep their shape. They are also made of a specially formulated PVC that will easily withstand sub-zero temperatures and extreme heat without cracking. These " Easy Fit" mud guards feature an easy-to-install design, and includes all the necessary hardware which facilitates easy installation.
feature_bullets: Patented, fiberglass backing that keeps them from cracking or splitting
Adds memory to keep their shape
Made of a specially formulated PVC
Withstands sub-zero temperatures and extreme heat without cracking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars122 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
